name: Methi Malai Chicken Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Methi Malai Chicken Recipe: Chicken 1kg Fenugreek (chopped) 1 cup Onion (chopped) 1 cup Green Chilies (chopped) 2 Coriander Powder 1 tsp Chili Powder 1 tsp Turmeric 1/2 tsp Cream 2 tsp Ginger Garlic Paste 1tsp Yogurt as required
instructions: Grind together onion and green chilies. Marinate chicken with ginger garlic paste, yogurt, spices, and keep for 30mins. Heat oil; add onion and green chili paste. Fry for 5mins, add chopped methi Add marinated chicken, cover and cook for 20mins. Lastly add malai leave it on dum. Serve with Nan.
